awards.title: Recognized Achievements
awards.line1: JA Imari Yumeimari Asparagus Division - Grand Prize Winner
awards.line2: March 2024 - Gold Medal at the Vegetable Sommelier Summit
awards.line3: Featured in special menu by Executive Chef at Hotel Okura JR Huis Ten Bosch

testimonials.text: "Sweeter than Hokkaido asparagus! Impressive size and freshness. Just boiling brought out the full flavor."
"Tried it raw and was amazed by the sweetness! I immediately decided to reorder."
"Can’t wait for the season! Bought it last year and was thrilled. Thick and tender — just perfect."
